trans-unit.source: Specifies a standard interface for retrieving feature information from the current system.
trans-unit.target: 指定用于从当前系统中检索功能信息的标准接口。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, IFeatureSupport provides methods you can use to determine whether a feature is currently installed on the system and to get the version number of a feature.
trans-unit.target: 类中实现时，IFeatureSupport 提供可用来确定系统上当前是否安装了一项功能，并以获取一项功能的版本号的方法。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport.IsPresent%2A> to determine whether a feature, or a specific version of a feature, is currently installed.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport.IsPresent%2A>以确定是否一项功能或特定版本的一项功能，当前已安装。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport.IsPresent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport.GetVersionPresent%2A> to determine the version number of an installed feature.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport.GetVersionPresent%2A>以确定安装的功能的版本号。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.IFeatureSupport.GetVersionPresent%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature> classes for implementations of this interface.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature>为此接口的实现的类。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FeatureSupport>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the version of the specified feature.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定的功能的版本。

trans-unit.source: For an implementation of this method, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.OSFeature.GetVersionPresent%2A>.
The feature whose version is requested.
A <xref:System.Version> representing the version number of the specified feature; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the feature is not installed.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Version>表示指定的功能; 的版本号或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果不安装该功能。</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether any version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的任何的功能版本是否在系统上当前可用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the feature is present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果的功能是，存在;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified or newer version of the specified feature is currently available on the system.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的功能的指定或较新版本是否在系统上当前可用。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Version> representing the minimum version number of the feature to look for.
trans-unit.target: 一个<xref:System.Version>表示要查找为的功能的最低版本号</xref:System.Version>，

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the requested version of the feature is present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果的功能所需的版本，存在;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
